item.title: AeroMIT - Graphics Design
item.description: I never really saw myself ever getting involved in any kind of designing activities, as I don’t feel I’m artistic enough or have the required a e s t h e t i c abilities. However, I was given the responsibility to design a couple of posters, presentations and brochures for my team AeroMIT, our university’s aeromodelling team. I created a couple of items which I think are all right
